00036 // Define FIRMWARE regions into flash by using their start address (116-bit word address)
00037 #define FIRST_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS    0x000000
00038 #define SECOND_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS   0x200000
00039 #define THIRD_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS    0x400000
00040 #define FOURTH_FIRMWARE_PAGE_BASE_WORD_ADDRESS   0x600000
00041 
00042 #define MAIN_MEM_PAGE_READ          0xD2
00043 #define MAIN_MEM_PAGE_PROG_TH_BUF1  0x82
00044 #define PAGE_ERASE                  0x81
00045 
00046 #define FIRST_PAGE_BCK  1408
00047 #define FIRST_PAGE_STD  768
00048 #define CF_SIZE         166965

00050 /* get time in milliseconds */
00051 /*
00052 static long get_time()
00053 {
00054 long time_ms;
00055 
00056 #ifdef WIN32
00057     struct _timeb timebuffer;
00058 
00059     _ftime( &timebuffer );
00060     time_ms = (long)timebuffer.time * 1000 + (long)timebuffer.millitm;
00061 #else
00062     struct timeval t1;
00063     struct timezone tz;
00064 
00065     gettimeofday(&t1, &tz);
00066     time_ms = (t1.tv_sec) * 1000 + t1.tv_usec / 1000;
00067 #endif
00068 
00069     return time_ms;
00070 }
00071 */

00073 void usage(void)
00074 {
00075                 printf("\nCAENBridgeUpgrade V2.2 \n\n");
00076         printf("Usage: CAENBridgeUpgrade V1718 <VMEDevIndex> [FlashFile] [standard|backup] [-rbf]\n");
00077         printf("       CAENBridgeUpgrade V2718 <VMEDevIndex> <PCIDevIndex> [FlashFile] [standard|backup] [-rbf]\n");
00078         printf("       CAENBridgeUpgrade A2719 <VMEDevIndex> <PCIDevIndex> [FlashFile] [standard|backup] [-rbf]\n");
00079         printf("       CAENBridgeUpgrade A2818 <PCIDevIndex> [FlashFile] [standard|backup] [-rbf]\n");
00080         printf("       CAENBridgeUpgrade A3818 <PCIDevIndex> [FlashFile] [TargetFlashImage (0,1,2,3)] [-rbf]\n");
00081         printf("\n");
00082                 printf("Or:    CAENBridgeUpgrade V1718 <VMEDevIndex> [FwRevFile] fwrev\n");
00083         printf("       CAENBridgeUpgrade V2718 <VMEDevIndex> <PCIDevIndex> [FwRevFile] fwrev\n");
00084         printf("       CAENBridgeUpgrade A2719 <VMEDevIndex> <PCIDevIndex> [FwRevFile] fwrev\n");
00085         printf("       CAENBridgeUpgrade A2818 <PCIDevIndex> [FwRevFile] fwrev\n");
00086         printf("       CAENBridgeUpgrade A3818 <PCIDevIndex> [FwRevFile] fwrev\n");  
00087 }
00088 
00089 CVBoardTypes DecodeDev(char *arg)
00090 {
00091         if(( strcmp(arg, "V1718") == 0 )|| ( strcmp(arg, "v1718") == 0 )) return cvV1718;
00092         if(( strcmp(arg, "V2718") == 0 )|| ( strcmp(arg, "v2718") == 0 )) return cvV2718;
00093         if(( strcmp(arg, "A2719") == 0 )|| ( strcmp(arg, "a2719") == 0 )) return cvA2719;
00094         if(( strcmp(arg, "A2818") == 0 )|| ( strcmp(arg, "a2818") == 0 )) return cvA2818;
00095         if(( strcmp(arg, "A3818") == 0 )|| ( strcmp(arg, "a3818") == 0 )) return cvA3818;
00096         return -1;
00097 }
00098 
00099 int validateModel(FILE* fin, CVBoardTypes model, char** fwdata, int* fwsize) {
00100         //FILE* fin = fopen(fname, "rb");
00101         while (!feof(fin)) {
00102                 int last;
00103                 CFASegmentPtr segm = newSegment(fin, &last);
00104                 if (segm == NULL) {
00105                         fclose(fin);
00106                         return -2;
00107                 }
00108                 if (getSegmentType(segm) == CFA_SEGMENT_TYPE_2) {
00109                         CFASegmentType2* t2s = toType2(segm);
00110                         int i;
00111                         for (i = 0; i < t2s->numModels; i++) {
00112                                 if (model == t2s->models[i]->modelId) {
00113                                         *fwdata = malloc(t2s->fwSizeBytes);
00114                                         memcpy(*fwdata, t2s->fwData, t2s->fwSizeBytes);
00115                                         *fwsize = t2s->fwSizeBytes;
00116                                         deleteSegment(segm);
00117                                         return 0;
00118                                 }
00119                         }
00120                 }
00121                 deleteSegment(segm);
00122                 if (last) break;
00123         }
00124         return -1;
00125 }

00127 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00128 {
00129         FILE          *stream =NULL;
00130                 char*             fwdata;
00131                 int                       fwsize;
00132         CVBoardTypes  Board;
00133         short         Link;
00134         short         Device;
00135         int32_t       BHandle;
00136         int           fwcopy;
00137                 int             fwread;
00138                 int             cfa = 1;
00139                 int         fi;
00140         int             TargetFlashImage = 0;
00141         int           finish, i, verify_err,ret;
00142         int           bp, bcnt, pp;
00143         unsigned char pdw[264], pdr[264], c;
00144         cvFlashAccess   flash;
00145         // char           FWRel[20];
00146 
00147         if( argc < 4 ) {
00148                 usage();
00149                 exit(1);
00150         }
00151 
00152         fwcopy = 0;
00153                 fwread = 0;
00154                 cfa = 0;
00155                 fi = 0;
00156 
00157         switch( (Board = DecodeDev(argv[1])) ) {
00158         case cvV1718:
00159         case cvA2818:
00160                 if( argc >= 5 ) {
00161                         if( strcmp((char*)argv[4], "standard" ) == 0 ) {
00162                                 fwcopy = 0;
00163                         } else {
00164                                 if( strcmp((char*)argv[4], "backup") == 0 ) {
00165                                         fwcopy = 1;
00166                                 } else if ( strcmp((char*)argv[4], "fwrev") == 0 ) {
00167                                                                                 fwread = 1;
00168                                                                 } else {
00169                                         usage();
00170                                         exit(1);
00171                                 }
00172                         }
00173                                                 if (argc >= 6 && (strcmp(argv[5], "-rbf") == 0)) {
00174                                                         cfa = 0;
00175                                                 }
00176                 }
00177                 if( Board == cvV1718 ) {
00178                                                 flash.Sel_Flash = 0x04; // FLENA 
00179                                                 flash.RW_Flash = 0x03;
00180                         Device = atoi((const char*)argv[2]);
00181                         Link = 0;
00182                 } else {
00183                                                 flash.Sel_Flash = 0x14; 
00184                                                 flash.RW_Flash = 0x10;
00185                         Device = 0;
00186                         Link = atoi((const char*)argv[2]);
00187                 }
00188                 if(!fwread && (stream = fopen((const char*)argv[3], "rb" )) == NULL ) {
00189                         printf( "File %s not found\n",(char *)argv[3]);
00190                         exit(1);
00191                 }
00192                                 if (!fwread)
00193                                         printf("\n\nLoading file %s\n", argv[3]);
00194                 break;
00195         case cvV2718:
00196         case cvA2719:
00197                 if( argc < 5 ) {
00198                         usage();
00199                         exit(1);
00200                 }
00201                 if( argc >= 6 ) {
00202                         if( strcmp((char*)argv[5], "standard") == 0 ) {
00203                                 fwcopy = 0;
00204                         } else {
00205                                 if( strcmp((char*)argv[5], "backup") == 0 ) {
00206                                         fwcopy = 1;
00207                                 } else if ( strcmp((char*)argv[5], "fwrev") == 0 ) {
00208                                                                                 fwread = 1;
00209                                                                 } else {
00210                                         usage();
00211                                         exit(1);
00212                                 }
00213                         }
00214                                                 if (argc >= 7 && strcmp(argv[6], "-rbf") == 0) {
00215                                                         cfa = 0;
00216                                                 }
00217                 }
00218                 Device = atoi((const char*) argv[3]);
00219                 Link = atoi((const char*) argv[2]);
00220                 if(!fwread && (stream = fopen((const char*)argv[4], "rb" )) == NULL ) {
00221                         printf( "File %s not found\n",argv[4]);
00222                         exit(1);
00223                 }
00224                 if (Board == cvA2719) {
00225                         flash.Sel_Flash = 0x03;
00226                         flash.RW_Flash = 0x02;
00227                                 }else {
00228                                         flash.Sel_Flash = 0x04;
00229                                         flash.RW_Flash = 0x03;
00230                                 }
00231                                 if (!fwread) 
00232                                         printf("\n\nLoading file %s\n", argv[4]);
00233                 break;
00234         case cvA3818:
00235                         if( argc >= 5 ) {
00236                                                 if (strcmp((char*)argv[4], "fwrev")==0) fwread = 1;
00237                                                 else TargetFlashImage = atoi((const char*)argv[4]);
00238                                                 if (argc >= 6 && strcmp(argv[5], "-rbf") == 0) {
00239                                                         cfa = 0;
00240                                                 }
00241                 }
00242                 Device = 0;
00243                 Link = atoi((const char*)argv[2]);
00244                 if(!fwread && (stream = fopen((const char*)argv[3], "rb" )) == NULL ) {
00245                         printf( "File %s not found\n",argv[3]);
00246                         exit(1);
00247                 }
00248                                 if (!fwread)
00249                                         printf("\n\nLoading file %s\n", argv[3]);
00250                 break;
00251         default:
00252             usage();
00253             exit(1);
00254         }
00255 
00256                 if (cfa) {
00257                         printf("CFA mode\n");
00258                         if (validateModel(stream, Board, &fwdata, &fwsize) < 0) {
00259                                 fclose(stream);
00260                                 printf("\n\nCannot find a compatible firmware in the CFA file\n");
00261                                 exit(99);
00262                         }
00263                 }
00264 
00265         // initialize the Board
00266         if( CAENVME_Init(Board, Link, Device, &BHandle) != cvSuccess ) {
00267                 printf("\n\nError opening the device\n");
00268                 exit(1);
00269         }
00270 
00271                 if (fwread) {
00272                         char fwrev[100];
00273                         int ret; // major, minor;
00274                         if ((Board == cvV2718) || (Board == cvA2719)) { 
00275                                 stream = fopen((const char*)argv[4], "w" );
00276                         }
00277                         else {
00278                                 stream = fopen((const char*)argv[3], "w" );
00279                         }
00280                         memset(fwrev,0,100);
00281                         ret = CAENVME_BoardFWRelease(BHandle,fwrev);
00282                         if (ret) {
00283                                 printf("\n\nError reading firmware revision\n");
00284                                 CAENVME_End(BHandle);
00285                                 exit(1);
00286                         }
00287                         //major = fwrev >> 8;
00288            // minor = fwrev & 0xFF;
00289                         //fprintf(stream,"Firmware revision = %d.%02d",major,minor);
00290                         fprintf(stream,"Firmware revision = %s",fwrev);
00291                         fclose(stream);
00292                         printf("\n\nFirmware revision read successfully\n");
00293                         CAENVME_End(BHandle);
00294                         exit(0);
00295                 }
00296 
00297         if (Board == cvA3818) {
00298                         if (!cfa) ret = A3818UpgradeFromFile(BHandle,stream,TargetFlashImage,A3818_UPGRADE_FULL);
00299                         else ret = A3818UpgradeFromMem(BHandle,fwdata,fwsize,TargetFlashImage,A3818_UPGRADE_FULL);
00300                         CAENVME_End(BHandle);
00301                         exit(0);
00302         }
00303         
00304         bcnt = 0;                // byte counter
00305 
00306         if( fwcopy == 0 )
00307                 pp=FIRST_PAGE_STD;   // page pointer
00308         else
00309                 pp=FIRST_PAGE_BCK;
00310 
00311         bp = 0;                  // byte pointer in the page
00312         finish = 0;              // it goes high when eof is found
00313         verify_err = 0;          // number of errors during verify
00314                 
00315                 flash.Handle = BHandle;
00316                 flash.RegSize = 4;
00317                 flash.FlashEnable = 1;
00318                 flash.PageSize = 264;
00319 
00320                 if (Board == cvA2719) {
00321                                         uint32_t reg32;
00322                                         int res = 0;
00323 
00324                                         reg32 = !flash.FlashEnable;
00325                                         res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(flash.Handle, flash.Sel_Flash, reg32);
00326                                         // Enable flash
00327                                         res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(flash.Handle, flash.Sel_Flash, flash.FlashEnable);
00328 
00329                                         // Opcode
00330                                         res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(flash.Handle, flash.RW_Flash, MAIN_MEM_PAGE_PROG_TH_BUF1_CMD);
00331 
00332                                         // Disable flash
00333                                    reg32 = !flash.FlashEnable;
00334                                         res |= CAENVME_WriteRegister(flash.Handle, flash.Sel_Flash, reg32);
00335                                 }
00336 
00337         while( !finish ) {
00338                 if (!cfa) c = (unsigned char)fgetc(stream);  // read one byte from file
00339                                 else c = fwdata[fi++];
00340                 // mirror byte (lsb becomes msb)
00341                 pdw[bp] = 0;
00342                 for( i = 0; i < 8; i++ )
00343                         if( c & (1 << i) )
00344                                 pdw[bp] = pdw[bp] | (0x80 >> i);
00345                 bp++;
00346                 bcnt++;
00347                 if( !cfa && feof(stream) ) finish = 1;
00348                                 else if (cfa && fi >= fwsize) finish = 1;
00349                 //write and verify a page
00350                 if( (bp == 264) || finish ) {
00351                         printf(".");
00352                         fflush(stdout);
00353                         if ((Board == cvV1718) || (Board == cvV2718) || (Board == cvA2818) || (Board == cvA2719)) {
00354                             CAENVME_WriteFlashPage(BHandle, pdw, pp);  // write page
00355                             CAENVME_ReadFlashPage(BHandle, pdr, pp);    // read page
00356                         }
00357                         else {  
00358                           WriteFlashPage(&flash, pdw, pp);  // write page
00359                           ReadFlashPage(&flash, pdr, pp);
00360                                                                    
00361                         }
00362                         for( i = 0; i < bp; i++ ) {               // verify page
00363                                 if( pdr[i] != pdw[i] ) {
00364                                         printf("%x = %x\n",pdr[i],pdw[i]);
00365                                         printf("\n\n Writing or Verify error at page %d - %d\n", pp, i);
00366                                         verify_err = 1;
00367                                         finish = 1;
00368                                         i = bp;
00369                                 }
00370             }
00371                         bp = 0;
00372                         pp++;
00373                 }
00374         }  // end of while loop
00375 
00376 
00377         fclose(stream);
00378 
00379         CAENVME_End(BHandle);
00380 
00381         if( verify_err > 0 ) {
00382                 printf("\n\n%d errors found during verify!\n",verify_err);
00383                 printf("Firmware upgrade not done. Move jumper to BCK to restore\n\n");
00384                                 return 1;
00385         } else {
00386                 printf("\n\nFirmware updated without errors. Written %d bytes\n",bcnt);
00387                 printf("Power cycle to load the new firmware\n\n");
00388                                 return 0;
00389         }
00390 }
